position.marginalia_text: nigredine et immunditatia debet fieri mundatio. Vnde inquit Hermes [etc.]

marginalia.translation: [From this] blackness and dirtiness it must be cleaned. Of this Hermes says etc.

position.marginalia_text: Item Alteratio est mutatio secundu[m] qualitate[m] facta ex quada[m] materia[e] locali permutatione[m]. Qui motus [etc]

marginalia.translation: Alteration is a change of quality, which is achieved from certain thorough change of place. The mover etc.

position.marginalia_text: Primus ergo modus fuit sublimatio. Et causa inventionis eius fuit: quia non noverunt Antiqui Philosophi, nec nos, nec qui post nos venturi su[n]t, aliquod quod vniret corpora nisi

marginalia.translation: The first mode is sublimation. And the cause of this invention is because the ancient sages did not know, nor do we, nor shall those who follow us. Anything that unites the bodies unless.
